AREA.description: The area of the date fruit in the image, in pixel units

PERIMETER.description: The perimeter of the date fruit in the image, in pixel units

MAJOR_AXIS.description: The length of the major axis of the date fruit in the image, in pixel units

MINOR_AXIS.description: The length of the minor axis of the date fruit in the image, in pixel units

ECCENTRICITY.description: The eccentricity of the date fruit shape

EQDIASQ.description: The equivalent diameter of a circle with the same area as the date fruit

SOLIDITY.description: The solidity of the date fruit shape

CONVEX_AREA.description: The area of the date fruit including the convex hull

EXTENT.description: The extent of the date fruit shape

ASPECT_RATIO.description: The aspect ratio of the date fruit shape

ROUNDNESS.description: The roundness of the date fruit shape

COMPACTNESS.description: The compactness of the date fruit shape

SHAPEFACTOR_1.description: Shape factor 1 of the date fruit shape

SHAPEFACTOR_2.description: Shape factor 2 of the date fruit shape

SHAPEFACTOR_3.description: Shape factor 3 of the date fruit shape

SHAPEFACTOR_4.description: Shape factor 4 of the date fruit shape

StdDevRR.description: Standard deviation of Red-Red color channel

StdDevRG.description: Standard deviation of Red-Green color channel

StdDevRB.description: Standard deviation of Red-Blue color channel

ALLdaub4RR.description: Wavelet transform of Red-Red color channel

ALLdaub4RG.description: Wavelet transform of Red-Green color channel

ALLdaub4RB.description: Wavelet transform of Red-Blue color channel

Class.description: The class of the date fruit

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in date fruit classification.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the date fruit, please predict the type of date fruit.
prompt.answer_prompt: BERHI[0], DEGLET[1], DOKOL[2], IRAQI[3], ROTANA[4], SAFAVI[5], SOGAY[6]?
